special_text:
If you cast [i]La Chaconne de Soupir No.3[/i], exile all creatures.
Each player returns a card they own exiled with [i]La Chaconne de Soupir No.3[/i] to the battlefield under their control.
Return a card exiled with [i]La Chaconne de Soupir No.3[/i] to the battlefield under your control.
